comments.body: This feels like a situation where we could potentially use a few repeat variants that don't use a Schedule to do very simple things like repeat an effect a specified number of times.
We could also define a `timeless` combinator that deletes `Clock` from a requirement, so you could do: `timeless(effect.retry(foo))`.
